description: Record Views without records in the project
sql:
SELECT A.OBJECTVALUE1
FROM PSPROJECTITEM A
WHERE A.PROJECTNAME = :1
	AND A.OBJECTTYPE = 30
	AND A.OBJECTID1 = 65
	AND A.OBJECTID2 = 81
	AND A.OBJECTVALUE2 = 2
	AND NOT EXISTS (
		SELECT 'X'
		FROM PSPROJECTITEM B
		WHERE B.PROJECTNAME = A.PROJECTNAME
			AND B.OBJECTTYPE = 0
			AND B.OBJECTID1 = 1
			AND B.OBJECTVALUE1 = A.OBJECTVALUE1
		)
